It is [93mimperative[0m in [93mcontemporary[0m [93mresearch[0m to [93mdevelop[0m [93mcontrollable[0m and [93mefficient[0m [93msynthetic[0m [93mstrategies[0m to [93mfacilitate[0m the [93mformation[0m of the [93munderlying[0m [93mstructures[0m of [93mcopper[0m [93mnanoclusters[0m, [93mparticularly[0m those with [93mdifferent[0m [93mcompositions[0m, [93mstructures[0m, and [93mfunctionalities[0m. [93mReported[0m [93mherein[0m is an [93mapproach[0m [93minvolving[0m the [93mconversion[0m of [93mpreexisting[0m [93mclusters[0m into [93mbinary[0m [93mcopper[0m-[93mselenide[0m [93msemiconductor[0m [93mnanoclusters[0m that [93mexhibit[0m [93mfavorable[0m [93mproperties[0m. In this [93mstudy[0m, a [93mCu[0m [93m8[0m [93mcluster[0m [93mcostabilized[0m by [93mbenzyl[0m-[93mfunctionalized[0m [93mselenolate[0m and [93mphosphine[0m [93mligands[0m was [93msynthesized[0m [93musing[0m a [93mone[0m-[93mpot[0m [93mmethod[0m. These [93mthree[0m [93mclusters[0m [93mexhibit[0m [93mdistinct[0m [93mstructural[0m [93mfeatures[0m; [93mnotably[0m, the [93mCu[0m [93m32[0m [93mcore[0m [93mintroduces[0m [93mselenium[0m [93matoms[0m that are not [93mpresent[0m in [93mCu[0m [93m8[0m , while the [93mCu[0m [93m34[0m [93mCl[0m [93m2[0m [93mcore[0m [93mintroduces[0m [93mboth[0m [93mselenium[0m and [93mchlorine[0m [93matoms[0m in [93mcomparison[0m to [93mCu[0m [93m8[0m . [93mDespite[0m these [93mdifferences[0m, [93mall[0m [93mclusters[0m [93mmaintain[0m a [93mcommon[0m [93mnucleosome[0m-[93mshell[0m-[93mligand[0m [93mstructure[0m.
